items.title: Sweet Drop
items.description: hard milk candy with a generous fresh milk filling.
items.ingredients: glucose syrup, sugar, condensed milk containing product "Mols" (skimmed milk, sugar, milk whey powder, vegetable fat, lactose), milk filling (22%) (glucose syrup, condensed milk containing product "Mols" (skimmed milk, sugar, milk whey powder, vegetable fat, lactose), sugar, milk fat, water-retaining agent sorbitol, emulsifier soya lecithin, salt, «Cream-vanilla» flavouring), milk fat, salt, «Cream-vanilla» flavouring, emulsifier soya lecithin.
